item.title: Budget-Friendly 10g pfSense Build with HP t740 for Effortless Networking
item.description: Discover how to effortlessly build a 10 gigabit capable pfSense router and firewall on a budget using the HP t740, ensuring high-performance networking for your needs.

item.title: Jellyfin vs Plex Media Server: A Comprehensive Comparison of Features and Costs

item.title: Recommended Every Day Carry (EDC)
item.category: "Recommended Every Day Carry (EDC)" , "SimeonOnSecurity's Recommended EDC" , "Everyday carry" , "Knives and blades" , "Flashlights" , "Watches" , "Pens" , "Bags and backpacks" , "Cases" , "Sleeves" , "Protection"
item.description: SimeonOnSecurity's Recommended EDC is a comprehensive guide to the best and most essential tools for everyday carry. This guide includes recommendations for knives and blades, flashlights, watches, and pens, with different price points for each category. The list also includes extra items such as bags and backpacks, cases, sleeves, and protection, ensuring that you are fully prepared for anything that life may throw your way. Whether you're looking for a budget-friendly option or a high-end premium product, this guide has you covered.
